title: Orlando furioso in English heroical verse, by Sr Iohn Haringto[n] of Bathe Knight.
author: Ariosto, Lodovico, 1474-1533.
publisher: By Richard Field, for Iohn Norton and Simon VVaterson,
notes: The title page is engraved and signed: Tho: Coxonus sculp.
The plates are English copies of originals by Girolamo Porro.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
